Posts.Content: This is a link to a short film online in which senior research and information nurse Barbara Moore gives advice on how to prevent cancer: http://www.itvlocal.com/wales/news/raceforlife/?player=WAL_RaceForLife_15&void=191970 The video is by ITV and is part of their coverage of the forthcoming Race 4 Life.
Posts.Title: Film of nurse giving cancer-prevention advice
